general.contact-text: I'm currently taking on new clients, and would love to hear about your project!

start.intro4: I understand both the visual and functional aspects of creating for the web.

about.quote: Somewhere between design â€“ a world of personas, pixels, and polish â€“ and engineering â€“ a world of logic, loops, and Linux â€“ lies
about.author: author of
about.tldr: TL;DR: I'm a designer, who eventually discovered the joy of coding and somehow ended up sitting full-time on the engineer's and back-end developer's floor. ðŸ‘»
about.text1: Fast-forward to 2023 (and a few identity crises later), I am still here, oscillating somewhere between the design and development worlds: I'm not a traditional graphic designer, but I have a strong knowledge of the design aspects of modern web development. I understand UX principles and I know how to apply them. I'm not a full-stack developer, but I am happy to write clean frontend code and create user interfaces that are responsive, performant, flexible, and compatible.
about.text2: So I guess you could say I am a designer-developer hybrid, a designer who codes, a frontend developer who designs, a creative UX-developer â€“ or whatever you want to call it. :)

skills.design-text1: With a keen eye for design and a focus on user experience, I'm great at creating
skills.design-text2: delightful interfaces that seamlessly blend aesthetics with functionality.
skills.design-text3: I'm a big fan of designing with code: By developing living style guides, it is often easier for teams to maintain scalable and consistent UIs. However, I still mostly use tools like Figma for ideation and sketching, and to create wireframes and mockups.
skills.code-text1: Writing code is my favorite way to bring designs to life:
skills.code-text2: As an 'architect' of user interfaces, I make sure that every button click, every animation and UI element responds intuitively.
skills.code-text3: By now, I've got a versatile technical skill set and I'm experienced in different frontend frameworks and libraries. That means I can pick the perfect tools for each project.
skills.ally-text1: My goal is to make the web a more accessible and engaging place.
skills.ally-text2: While there's still a lot to learn (and always will be), I am doing my best to build applications that are inclusive and smoothly adapt to different devices and screen sizes.
skills.ally-text3: Using end-to-end testing tools like Cypress.io, I furthermore ensure that the frontend functions correctly and meets high-quality standards.

contact.headline: Say hello!
contact.text: I'm currently taking on new clients, and would love to hear about your project! Please include as much information as possible about the scope, your timelines, and your budget.
contact.socials: Also, feel free to connect with me on the following platforms:

vita.pharma4u_text: At Pharma4u I am responsible for the UX/UI design and support the conception of new functions with visual representation through mock-ups and prototypes. Furthermore, I develop and test new frontend modules, maintain the in-house component library and integrate new designs or components into the extensive web application LabXpert. I carry out refactorings to improve code quality and facilitate maintainability. I am also working on the development of automated tests and the implementation of accessibility standards.
vita.interone_text: Developed, maintained, and shipped production code for client websites primarily using HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. Clients included BMW, SOS Kinderdorf, ProSiebenSat.1 Media and E.ON.
vita.kumu_title: B.A. Fine Arts and Multimedia, Minor Subject: Computer Sciences for Media
vita.kumu_text: Graphic Design, Web Design, Multimedia Design, Illustration, Animation, Motion Design, UX-Design, Art-/ Media History, Didactics of Art and Media, Photography, Culture Management, Programming and Software Development, Digital Media, Systems and Applications, Media Technology, Multimedia Programming, Multimedia in the Web, Human-Computer Interaction, Web Development
vita.eventa_text: Frontend Development, UX/UI, Illustration, Typography, Editorial Work, Image Retouching, Texting, (Product) Photography, Logo Design, Corporate Design, Print Design, Web Design
